How to Donate
Hello %nick%, here is some information about how to donation on L2fandc!
Donations Agreement
By submitting donation to Server L2fandc, you agree that you are NOT entitled to receive anything from us! Rewards list can be found in our Community Board from Services Page. You can donate with multiple ways like: - Paypal Click on our website at Donate) - PaySafeCard (Send Mail with PSC Pin and PICTURE to DonateL2fandc@gmail.com) - WebMoney and Bank Wire Transfer (Details in DonateL2fandc@gmail.com) - Full Support to Donate: Skype: DonateL2fandc (Take care to be our Official Skype)
You have donated already? Type from what mail you donated! (In Paypal)
